descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is open to graduates and undergraduates. It includes readings and discussion on the history of performance art, but it is primarily a performance class. Students will create solo and group performances based on myths, fairy tales and dreams. in each assignment a set of criteria will be given that emphasizes a different element of theatricality: light, sound, movement, disguise or environment. The readings for the course will include a course packet as well as parts or all of Roselee Goldberg's Performance Art and C.Carr's On Edge. Students will write papers on each others work and a final paper.
